name: WeaselGui
short_description: WeaselGui is middleware aimed at game developers to assist the creation of GUI and presentation layers. Simple, extendable, drop-in code with few dependencies for trivial integration. WeaselGui features in the book Game Engine Gems I © Weaseltron 2010.
